ancestor_concept_id.description:
User Guidance: The Concept Id for the higher-level concept
that forms the ancestor in the relationship.

descendant_concept_id.description:
User Guidance: The Concept Id for the lower-level concept
that forms the descendant in the
relationship.

min_levels_of_separation.description:
User Guidance: The minimum separation in number of
levels of hierarchy between ancestor and
descendant concepts. This is an attribute
that is used to simplify hierarchic analysis.

max_levels_of_separation.description:
User Guidance: The maximum separation in number of
levels of hierarchy between ancestor and
descendant concepts. This is an attribute
that is used to simplify hierarchic analysis.
